p: It is found on hard bottom environments, from the intertidal zone to depths up to 12 m ( Sebens, 1982), where it can be dominant ( Monteiro et al., 2008). Colonies have a mat format usually occupying large areas along the substratum ( Sebens, 1982; Acosta, 2001; Silva et al., 2015). The animal’s color varies from yellow and brown to bronze, easily identifiable in the field ( Fig. 1A).
